meanings.definition: A member of a people living in Sri Lanka and southern India.
meanings.sent1: The sinh greeted me warmly at the market.
meanings.sent2: Many sinh people celebrate the traditional New Year.
meanings.sent3: Why did the sinh bring a coconut to the party?
meanings.sent4: The sinh's smile was as bright as the tropical sun.
meanings.sent5: I will never forget the colorful attire of the sinh dancers.

meanings.definition: The language of the Sinhalese, an Indo-Aryan language spoken in Sri Lanka.
meanings.sent1: Learning sinh is a great way to connect with the culture.
meanings.sent2: She spoke sinh fluently with her relatives.
meanings.sent3: The parrot tried to mimic the sounds of sinh.
meanings.sent4: Her words in sinh painted a beautiful picture in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The melody of sinh songs filled the air with joy.
